author: Jonathan Tamari
title: Dave McCormick has dropped millions into Pa.'s U.S. Senate race, but it's hard to trace where it's coming from

sentence: He had just spent about an hour listening to Republican U.S. Senate candidate Dave McCormick as he addressed several dozen people in a private room, talking about his qualifications and what separates him from the rest of the crowded primary field.
author: Paula Reed Ward
title: Republican U.S. Senate candidate Dave McCormick greets potential voters in Murrysville

sentence: The nation is watching us work to reclaim the greatness of our country, and sending someone, someone like Dave McCormick, to Washington, D.C. is something you can be proud of.
author: WKOK Staff
title: McCormick Rally with Sec. Pompeo: America Headed ‘Wrong Direction’
